data.name: memoEdit1.EditValue
data.value:
Analogy Log Viewer is multi purpose Log Viewer for Windows Operating System:
A customizable Log Viewer with ability to create custom providers. Can be used with C#, C++, Python, Java and others.
It supports three modes: 1. Offline data providers (many parsers of different files types) 2. Online / real time providers (like windows event logs or gRPC) 3. Connect to gRPC Analogy Log Server (https://github.com/Analogy-LogViewer/Analogy.LogViewer.gRPC) to read messages send by any executable that can use gRPC client.
There are many differerent data providers available for use. A complete list exist at: https://github.com/Analogy-LogViewer/Analogy

data.name: memoEdit2.EditValue
data.value:
The different implementations are arranged by top level main menu: each data provider has its own tab in the ribbon (gRPC Receiver, IIS Parser, etc). First tab is Analogy "format": you can save logs from any provider in a format the application can read Regardless the data provider existance/loaded.
Ribbon Elements: Each offline Data Provider has the following: ● Open Folder: Open pre-defined folder ● Recent Folders: Open recent folders (number of items is configurable in the user settings) ● Open Files: Open the Open File dialog to select file for loading. ● File Pooling: Same as "Open Files" but reloading the selected file on changes . ● Recent Files: Same as recent folders (number of items is configurable in the user settings) ● Known locations: User defined location (local paths or network path where log files are stored) ● Bookmarks: shows any saved bookmarks.

data.name: memoEdit3.EditValue
data.value:
Settings Options: ● Application Settings: Application level settings: ○ single/multi instance, ○ Caching of loaded files (on by default), ○ Support for compressed files ○ remember last position ● Filtering Settings: settings related to filtering operations (simple/advance mode, save filters, sorting, messages layout and columns names). ● Pre-Defined Queries: configure user defined filters ● Look And Feel: Defines message's colors ● Shortcuts: Application defined shortcuts. ● Most Recently used: Defined file/folder recent settings ● Data Providers Settings: settings related to data providers: ○ Enable/Disable data providers. ○ Auto startup for real time data providers. ○ Default file Association (force opening file log with specific provider)
● Custom Data Providers Settings: Open specific data providers' settings ● User Statistics: Some statistics for current user. ● Updates: Enable/Disable update checker.
